title: Persistent legacy of the Chernobyl disaster

paragraphs.1: Replace “Chernobyl” with “Chornobyl” in the title, the preambular paragraphs and the operative paragraphs.
paragraphs.2: In the second preambular paragraph, insert “of Ukraine” after “Chornobyl nuclear power plant”.
paragraphs.3: After the fifth preambular paragraph, insert a new preambular paragraph reading: Stressing that the fortieth anniversary of the Chornobyl disaster in 2026 presents a critical opportunity for all stakeholders to actively commemorate the event and renew their commitment to long-term recovery, resilience and sustainable development,
paragraphs.4: In operative paragraph 1, replace “Takes note” with “Welcomes”.
paragraphs.6: After operative paragraph 7, insert a new operative paragraph reading: Decides to rename International Chernobyl Disaster Remembrance Day, proclaimed in its resolution 71/125 of 8 December 2016 and observed annually since 2017, as International Chornobyl Disaster Remembrance Day;
paragraphs.7: In operative paragraph 8, after “International Chornobyl Disaster Remembrance Day”, insert “, including by paying particular attention to the significance of marking this day in 2026,”.
paragraphs.8: In operative paragraph 10, replace “Strengthening of international cooperation and coordination of efforts to study, mitigate and minimize the consequences of the Chernobyl disaster” with “Strengthening of international cooperation and coordination of efforts to study, mitigate and minimize the consequences of the Chornobyl disaster”.
